resources.title: Spy x Family
resources.exp: A spy on an undercover mission gets married and adopts a child as part of his cover.

resources.title: Kaguya Sama Love is War
resources.exp: Shirogane and Kaguya, can't admit they're in love, so each tries to win a confession of affection from the other.

resources.title: Shenmue the animation
resources.exp: Ryo Hazuki has trained to master the Hazuki Style Jujitsu under his strict father in the Hazuki Dojo from his childhood.

resources.title: Salaryman's Club
resources.exp: Mikoto Shiratori is a childhood prodigy at badminton, but who never recovered from a major loss during a high school competition.

resources.title: My Dress up Darling
resources.exp: A loner boy and a flashy girl find common ground via cosplay in this sweet and spicy romcom!

resources.title: Attack On Titan: Season 2
resources.exp: After fighting the Female Titan, Eren finds no time to rest as a horde of Titans is approaching Wall Rose and the battle for humanity continues.

resources.title: Shaman King
resources.exp: It follows the adventures of Yoh Asakura as he attempts to hone his shaman skills to become the Shaman King by winning the Shaman Fight.

resources.title: Dance Dance Danseur
resources.exp: Junpei Murao was fascinated with ballet as a child, but in his second year of middle school, his father passed away and he decided he needed to become more masculine, and he gave up on his aspirations. .

resources.title: Love of Kill
resources.exp: During one of her bounty hunter missions, Chateau Dankworth comes across Song Ryang-ha, a professional hitman, who begins stalking and brokering her information in exchange for a date.

resources.title: Demon Slayer: Season 3
resources.exp: Tanjiro travel to the Swordsmith Village in order to have his blade repaired by Hotaru Haganezuka. While there, Tanjiro and co will, of course, be beset by a horde of demons
